scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('lightningcss'); } catch(e) { console.log('Installing lightningcss native binaries...'); require('child_process').execSync('npm install --no-save lightningcss-linux-x64-gnu lightningcss-darwin-x64 lightningcss-darwin-arm64 lightningcss-win32-x64-msvc', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
